gov.va.isaac.models.api

Interface InformationModelService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BdbInformationModelService

    public interface InformationModelService
    Generically represents a service for interacting with information models.
    Author:
    bcarlsenca

                              throws IOException,
                                     org.ihtsdo.otf.tcc.api.contradiction.ContradictionException
        Returns the information model for the specified uuid. Returns null if there is no corresponding information model.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the uuid
        Returns:
        the information model
        Throws:
        IOException - if anything goes wrong
        org.ihtsdo.otf.tcc.api.contradiction.ContradictionException - if anything goes wrong

      • getInformationModel

        InformationModel getInformationModel(InformationModelType type,
                                     String key)
                              throws IOException,
                                     org.ihtsdo.otf.tcc.api.contradiction.ContradictionException
        Returns the information model for the specified model-specific key. Returns null if there is no corresponding information model. For example, this takes an information model type, like InformationModelType.CEM, and an identifier or unique name in that type, like DiastolicBloodPressure_KEY_ECID, and returns the corresponding model object. This is a way of finding a model when you do not know its ISAAC UUID. In the background, this is implemented by using the lucene index.
        Parameters:
        type - the type
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the information model
        Throws:
        IOException - if anything goes wrong
        org.ihtsdo.otf.tcc.api.contradiction.ContradictionException - if anything goes wrong
